description:
The Appeal-Democrat app is a must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all that Yuba-Sutter has to offer. Reading local news daily keeps you connected wherever you go with the official companion to the Appeal-Democrat, the daily newspaper for Yuba and Sutter counties in CA. Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted journalists. Access local news stories plus sports, entertainment, videos and much more. The simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. 
The Appeal-Democrat app is an ad-supported application.
